name: Consultation
description: A comprehensive dental evaluation to assess oral health and discuss treatment options.

name: Oral Prophylaxis / Cleaning
description: A professional cleaning to remove plaque, tartar, and stains from teeth.

name: Tooth Filling
description: A procedure to restore a decayed or damaged tooth using a filling material.

name: Tooth Extraction
description: The removal of a tooth from its socket due to decay, damage, or overcrowding.

name: Wisdom Tooth Removal
description: Surgical extraction of impacted or problematic wisdom teeth.

name: Mouthguard
description: A custom-fitted device to protect teeth during sports or to prevent grinding.

name: Denture
description: Removable prosthetics to replace missing teeth, either partially or completely. Can be unilateral, partial, or complete.

name: Root Canal Treatment
description: A procedure to remove infected pulp from a tooth and seal it to prevent further infection.
